about_the_game:
ATC Flight Operator is an air traffic control simulation engine with a powerful interface that gives users complete control of their airspace.  Are you capable of taking control of an iconic airport while preventing mid-air collisions, and still directing airplanes to land as quickly as possible?

MAIN FEATURES

ATC Flight Operator presents players with an incredibly realistic air-traffic control experience while also embracing simplicity and arcade-style design features to make sure that players of all types can enjoy this experience.

PLANE DIRECTOR

Take control of your airspace by using the Plane Director to send commands to every aircraft in real-time.  Communicate with airplanes as you command them to specific headings, altitudes, and air speeds. 

Prevent mid-air collisions and guide planes towards active runways.  Get planes established on the ILS (Instrument Landing System) and ensure that all planes have adequate spacing to land on the active runway.

AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL - AUDIO ENGINE

Air Traffic Control has never sounded so realistic! The audio engine that was designed with the sole purpose of creating a realistic-sounding environment puts users in a position to experience just what it's like to be an air traffic controller.  Every directive will be met with realistic audio lines from pilots as they respond to your commands.  

IMPROVE AS A CONTROLLER EVERY TIME YOU PLAY

Every time you take control of an airport,  you will be graded for every decision that you make.  All moves and decisions are recorded throughout the session and every move could impact your final grade. 

Will you fail or will you excel as an ATC Flight Operator?

STEAM INTEGRATION

ATC Flight Operator takes full advantage of exclusive features from Steam,  including Achievements and Leaderboards.  Test your ability as you climb the Leaderboards and earn Achievements along the way!
